title: Team Cofidis Blasts Tour de France Rider’s ‘Too Heavy’ Bike Snub: ‘This Is Cutting-Edge Equipment’
content:
'My bike is 1kg too heavy': Guillaume Martin didn't use a power meter at the Tour for fear of adding extra weight to his Look 795 bike frame.

Read the full article at Team Cofidis Blasts Tour de France Rider’s ‘Too Heavy’ Bike Snub: ‘This Is Cutting-Edge Equipment’ on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
